CustomField.formula: ((AFP_Val__c + PFP_Val__c + Price_With_GP__c) + (NBT__c * (AFP_Val__c + PFP_Val__c + Price_With_GP__c)) + (( (AFP_Val__c + PFP_Val__c + Price_With_GP__c) * SSLT__c ) * ( Govt_Entity__c / 100))+ (TPC_Percent__c * (AFP_Val__c + PFP_Val__c + Price_With_GP__c))) * VAT__c
CustomField.label: VAT Amount
